headline: Pentair to Attend the Baird Global Industrial Conference
summary: LONDON, United Kingdom, November 12, 2024--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR), a leader in helping the world sustainably move, improve and enjoy water, life’s most essential resource, will be attending the Baird Global Industrial Conference in Chicago, Illinois on November 13th. President and Chief Executive Officer John L. Stauch will present at 12:00 p.m. Central Time.
